episodes.title: Unveiling Opus Dei: Ann Marie Allen speaks out | Upfront with Katie Hannon
episodes.description:
Irishwoman Ann Marie Allen’s story was central to a major investigation published by the Financial Times two weeks ago. In her first interview with Irish broadcast media, she told Katie Hannon on ‘Upfront: The Podcast’ further remarkable details about what she experienced within Opus Dei.

Read more: https://www.rte.ie/news/upfront/2024/0329/1440677-unveiling-opus-dei-irishwoman-from-ft-investigation-speaks-out/

Listen to the podcast in full: https://www.rte.ie/radio/podcasts/22377631-unveiling-opus-dei-ann-marie-allen-speaks-out/
